description:
The official motorcycle theory tests comes with Palm Pre.

Prepare your theory test for motorcycle with latest and official DSA question bank which has over 832 questions.

For more screen shots and video demo, please visit our website:
www.uktheorytest.com


PREPARE BY TOPICS:
You can study the high way code by topic. All questions are sorted by topic. It also tell you the areas that each topic covers.
Accidents,
Alertness,
Attitude,
Documents,
Hazard Awareness,
Motorcycle Rules,
Other Types of Vehicle,
Road and Traffic Signs,
Rules of the Road,
Safety Margins,
Safety and Your Motorcycle,
Motorcycle Handling,
Motorcycle Loading,
Vulnerable Road Users.


MOCK TEST MODE:
Mock test simulates the real test format. Questions are presented randomly from all the topics.


DETAILED TEST RESULT:
The summery of practice test is presented at the end of each test. It shows you the time you took, the score, which questions you scored correctly and where you were wrong. And yes, you can EMAIL the results.


PROGRESS METER:
The app records your progress as you start giving practice tests. It shows you beautiful chart so that you can track your weak areas and give more focus on them.


FEATURE LIST:
Over 832 multiple choice questions.
Choose number of questions you would like in each test.
Show test result in HTML format with.
E-mail yourself the test results and track your progress.
A new module, "Progress Meter" keeps track of  how you nonperforming in particular topic or mock test.
Choose your own timer setting.
Special algorithm that randomizes questions every time you take a test.
Mock test has exact similar format as in real test.


COPYRIGHT INFO:
Crown copyright material reproduced under license from the Driving Standard Agency and the controller of HMSO which does not accept any responsibility for the accuracy of the reproduction.

The questions are valid for theory tests taken after September 2011.
